articles.title: Brighton fans had every right to boo Graham Potter & Chelsea - 90min UK
articles.description: Graham Potter was booed on his return to Brighton in response to what Albion fans see as the asset stripping of their club being carried out by Chelsea and their former head coach.
articles.content: Poor Graham Potter. He really did not like the reception which greeted him on his first return to Brighton as Chelsea manager. The Amex was a cauldron of noise; first boos, followed by chants of "You… [+6028 chars]
